# maximumRetries

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of retries.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumRetries: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can specify up to 256 retries. By default, the value of this parameter is `0`.

## Configuring a Tag Command

- **retryInterval**: The time between retries, in seconds.

items.description: The time between retries, in seconds.
